reporting-org.narrative: Norad - Norwegian Agency for Development Cooperation

title.narrative: Hfu - International Seabed Authority ISA - Abyssal Initiative for Blue Growth

description.narrative:
The objective of this project is to strengthen the capacity of Pacific Small Island Developing States (PSIDS), who are currently sponsoring exploration activities in the international seabed area (the Area). These are: the Cook Islands, Nauru, Kiribati and Tonga.
This project has two main objectives: (i) ensuring that the Pacific Sponsoring States are in a position to comply with their national and international obligations as seabed activities progress, and (ii) that the necessary governance structures and mechanisms required are in place, in order to achieve these objectives in an effective manner.
IMPACT: Pacific Small Island Developing States (P-SIDS) can access sustainably and benefit from seabed activities and from the Blue Economy opportunities
Outcome 1: National capacities of P-SIDS to operate deep seabed mining policy and regulatory frameworks are strengthened
Outcome 2: Mid and long-term options for maintaining capacity-building efforts identified
The target group is government representatives from Pacific Small Island Developing States (P-SIDS).
